info.title: ORES scoring interface
info.description:
A RESTful API for scoring revisions (v3 paths).  These paths provide
access to a set of scoring models.  This API primarily differs from v1 in
that there is only one response document schema that any path returns.
This response document contains 'error' information, 'warnings' and
'scores' structures.

There's also new functionality for returning 'feature' values used in
scoring and 'inject'ing custom feature values for scoring.

ScoreDocument.description: A score generated by a model for a specific revision (or the error that occurred while generating a score)

error.description: If scoring this revision failed, this field contains information about the error

code.description: A short string identifying the error

message.description: A human-readable explanation of what went wrong

warnings.description: A list of warnings raised while generating a response

error.description: An error that prevented processing the request

code.description: A short string identifying the error

message.description: A human-readable explanation of what went wrong

ContextDocument.description: A mapping of scores and model information

code.description: A short string identifying the error

message.description: A human-readable explanation of what went wrong

trained.description: The datetime at which the model was trained (in seconds since Jan. 1st 1970)

params.description: A list of parameters used when constructing the model

type.description: The type of model used to score

test_stats.description: A list of test statistics used on the model.

RevisionScoresDocument.description: A collection of scores for a single revision (or an error)

features.description: A mapping of feature names to the values generated in scoring

error.description: The an error generated while trying to generate a score

get.summary: Precache scores of {revids} based on precaching configs.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description:
The name of the {context} to find {model}.  This is usually the
dbname of a wiki project.

parameters.name: bot
parameters.description: If the edit is made by a bot

parameters.name: revids
parameters.description: The revision IDs to score (split multiple ids with "|")

get.description: This route provides access to all {models} configured for precaching within a {context}.

503.description: Server overloaded -- Slow down and/or please try again later

200.description: A JSON document containing scores or information about the available models

default.description: An error occurred that prevented any scores from being generated

get.summary: Score {revids} using multiple {models} in the same request.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description:
The name of the {context} to find {model}.  This is usually the
dbname of a wiki project.

parameters.name: models
parameters.description: The name of a model to use when scoring

parameters.name: revids
parameters.description: The revision IDs to score (split multiple ids with "|")

parameters.name: model_info
parameters.description:
Model information fields to include in the response.  If no value is
provided, all info fields will be returned.  Otherise, fields will
be limited to those provided (e.g. "type|test_stats").

get.description:
This route provides access to all {models} within a {context}.  This
path is useful for either exploring information about {models} available
within a {context} or scoring one or more {revids} using one or more
{models} at the same time.

503.description: Server overloaded -- Slow down and/or please try again later

200.description: A JSON document containing scores or information about the available models

default.description: An error occurred that prevented any scores from being generated

get.summary: Score many {revids} using {model} in the same request.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description:
The name of the {context} to find {model}.  This is usually the
dbname of a wiki project.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The name of a model to use when scoring

parameters.name: model_info
parameters.description:
Model information fields to include in the response.  If no value is
provided, all info fields will be returned.  Otherise, fields will
be limited to those provided (e.g. "type|test_stats").

get.description:
Provides a means of scoring many {revids} using {model} in the same
request.

503.description: Server overloaded -- Slow down and/or please try again later

default.description: An error occurred that prevented any scores from being generated

get.summary: List available scoring contexts and models.

parameters.name: model_info
parameters.description:
Model information fields to include in the response.  If no value is
provided, all info fields will be returned.  Otherise, fields will
be limited to those provided (e.g. "type|test_stats").

get.description:
This route provides a list of available contexts for scoring.
Generally a wiki is 1:1 with a context and a context is expressed as
the database name of the wiki.  For example "enwiki" is English
Wikipedia and "wikidatawiki" is Wikidata.

200.description: A JSON document information about the available contexts and models

default.description: An error occurred that prevented contexts from being retrieved

parameters.name: context
parameters.description:
The name of the {context} to find {model}.  This is usually the
dbname of a wiki project.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The name of a model to use when scoring

parameters.name: model_info
parameters.description:
Model information fields to include in the response.  If no value is
provided, all info fields will be returned.  Otherise, fields will
be limited to those provided (e.g. "type|test_stats").

parameters.name: features
parameters.description:
If present, feature values used in scoring will be presented in the
response

parameters.name: inject
parameters.description:
A JSON formatted set of of pre-computed datasources/features to use
when scoring.  Keys correspond to the name of dependencies used
when scoring (e.g. features and datasources).

get.description: Provides a means of scoring {revid} using {model} in {context}.

503.description: Server overloaded -- Slow down and/or please try again later

default.description: An error occurred that prevented any scores from being generated
